short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension redirects the user to the 'Redirect Link' page when accessing the 'Base Link' page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Policy Studio Redirector is a proprietary extension developed by Policy Studio. This extension is designed to streamline the workflow of our team by automatically redirecting them from a Base Link to a corresponding Redirect Link.
